    • Field Detail

      • currentPath

        public static final java.lang.String currentPath
        Stores here the Absolute Path of the program.

        Mainly used for setting the FileChooser.setInitialDirectory(File) to the current path of the program.

      • fileChooser

        public static javafx.stage.FileChooser fileChooser
        Stores here the FileChooser of the program.

      • root

        private static javafx.scene.Parent root
        Stores here the Parent of the JavaFX program. Imported by a .fxml file.

        The main Stage of the JavaFX program.

        The main Scene of the JavaFX program.
